title: MEng Thesis: Improving Astronaut Dexterity
desc: My MEng thesis - a hydraulic exo-skeleton approach to address lack of progress in soacesuit gloves.

title: Harbinger: Competition Rover
desc: Imperial College Space Society's first competing robot at the European Rover Challenge.

title: Svarog: SolarSail CubeSat
desc: An Imperial College Space Society project aiming to create a mission to send a cubesat beyond the Solar system.

title: SCALED: Generative Design for Athletes
desc: My industrial placement during my MEng was at ScaledTech working on ultra-customisable shock absorbers for athletes.

title: OptiArch: Generative Architecture
desc: The winning submission to the 'Cities of the Future' Hackathon.

title: LumiRo.cc: Visualising Asteroids
desc: A submission to the NASASpaceApps Hackathon which won a Global Nomination

title: POLARIS: Autonamous Naval Signalling
desc: The winning submission to the Ocean Infinity Hackathon solving the problem of visual signals needing sailors by applying polarising filters.

title: Axxel: Concussion Detection
desc: Product design and prototyping of an accessible tool to aid with the diagnosis of rugby-related concissions.

title: Modular CanSat
desc: An early Imperial College Space Society project that developed systems, electronics, and mechanical engineering skills by launching and recovering a coke-can format 'satellite'
